==Availability==
==Availability==
â
The phone is expected to be sold [[SIM lock|SIM-unlocked]]<ref>http://www.slashgear.com/galaxy-nexus-gets-priced-sim-free-19189361/</ref> and hardware-unlocked (unlocked bootloader, allowing [[Rooting (Android OS)|root access]]),<ref>http://www.engadget.com/2011/10/24/motorola-razr-open-for-unlocked-bootloader-business-if-the-carr/</ref> following the tradition of the Nexus phones, [[Nexus One]]<ref>http://reviews.cnet.com/smartphones/htc-nexus-one-by/4505-6452_7-33906802.html</ref><ref>http://www.zdnet.com/blog/cell-phones/buying-the-nexus-one-unlocked-is-probably-the-best-choice/2879</ref> and [[Nexus S]]<ref>http://reviews.cnet.com/smartphones/samsung-nexus-s-at/4505-6452_7-34431171.html</ref>.
+
The phone is expected to be sold [[SIM lock|SIM-unlocked]]<ref>http://www.slashgear.com/galaxy-nexus-gets-priced-sim-free-19189361/</ref> and hardware-unlocked (unlocked bootloader, allowing [[Rooting (Android OS)|root access]]),<ref>http://www.engadget.com/2011/10/24/motorola-razr-open-for-unlocked-bootloader-business-if-the-carr/</ref> following the tradition of the Nexus phones: [[Nexus One]]<ref>http://reviews.cnet.com/smartphones/htc-nexus-one-by/4505-6452_7-33906802.html</ref><ref>http://www.zdnet.com/blog/cell-phones/buying-the-nexus-one-unlocked-is-probably-the-best-choice/2879</ref> and [[Nexus S]]<ref>http://reviews.cnet.com/smartphones/samsung-nexus-s-at/4505-6452_7-34431171.html</ref>.
The phone will be supported by the carrier [[NTT DoCoMo]] in Japan, where the variant sold there will be officially known as the [[:ja:SC-04D|SC-04D]] within the [[:ja:docomo NEXT series|docomo NEXT series]] of smartphone devices.
The phone will be supported by the carrier [[NTT DoCoMo]] in Japan, where the variant sold there will be officially known as the [[:ja:SC-04D|SC-04D]] within the [[:ja:docomo NEXT series|docomo NEXT series]] of smartphone devices.
